TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIDynamicItem_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoTouch.UIKit.UIBezierPath GetCollisionBoundingPath (this MonoTouch.UIKit.IUIDynamicItem This);
.method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.UIKit.UIBezierPath GetCollisionBoundingPath(class MonoTouch.UIKit.IUIDynamicItem This) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the closed path that is used for collision detection.
